name: MORT NATURELLE
description:
Mort naturelle is a survival game in Alpha (only for Yt subscriber), in the game you can create your life, your house...

Whane you spawn there is a table whos there is fodd thirsd and medkit(spawn all 60sec)

the map is 1 kilometer for 1 kilometer

There is a day/night systeme

good game,

Ps : I am French so my English can't be so amazing, so excuse me for all .mistakes
